channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: ‘Imran Khan is fully healthy’: Inside Rawalpindi’s Adiala Jail, where former Pakistan PM languishes
Sensex, Nifty near all-time high: Why the Indian stock market is soaring
‘Witi-Leaks’: Who made Trump peace envoy’s Kremlin phone call public?
White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt’s relative arrested by ICE: What we know so far
Who is Rahmanullah Lakanwal, the Afghan national, who shot 2 National Guardsmen in DC?
National Guard members shot near White House: Why are the troops in Washington, DC?
Donald Trump eyes loophole in Epstein Files Transparency Act
item.description: The US President had already instructed Pam Bondi to investigate Jeffrey Epstein’s ties to Bill Clinton and others, which allows withholding or redacting information

item.title: How Japan’s latest tensions with China will fuel stronger Delhi-Tokyo strategic alignment
item.description: The recent flare-up started after the statement by Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi in parliament that a Chinese military action against Taiwan could be considered a ‘survival-threatening situation’ for Japan

item.title: Why six-decade-long American embargo on Cuba must end now
item.description: On October 29, 2025, the UN General Assembly adopted a resolution calling for an end to the United States’ decades-long embargo against Cuba

item.title: Dharmendra: The timeless star who redefined the ‘leading man’
item.description: Amidst Bachchan and Kaka—and long before the Khans mastered tonal fluidity—Dharmendra had shown that a leading man could move from drama to comedy to romance without ever losing authenticity

item.title: ChatGPT is pushing people to suicide: Here's why it's not your therapist
item.description: Gen Z increasingly turns to ChatGPT for mental health support, but tragic cases like Zane Shamblin and Adam Raine highlight AI's dangers. Experts urge real therapists for true healing.

item.title: Timothée Chalamet’s bizarre Marty Supreme press run taps into a deeper cultural mood
item.description: Timothée Chalamet and A24’s wild Marty Supreme campaign, from an orange blimp over Los Angeles to ping-pong heads in New York, turns film marketing into a joyful, viral cultural event.
